metadata.description: Comprehensive chocolate database with professional ratings and detailed tasting notes

chocolates.name: Milk Chocolate 38%
chocolates.description: A milk chocolate from Brazil featuring notes of roasted, coffee, smooth.
chocolates.detailed_review: This Brazil chocolate opens with roasted aromas leading to coffee flavors on the palate. The 38% cocoa content provides excellent balance with a smooth, lingering finish.

chocolates.name: Pink Ruby 50%
chocolates.description: Exceptional ruby chocolate showcasing Tanzania's unique terroir with lime, citrus, wine-like characteristics.
chocolates.detailed_review: This Tanzania chocolate opens with lime aromas leading to citrus flavors on the palate. The 50% cocoa content provides excellent balance with a smooth, lingering finish.

chocolates.name: Ghana Selection 72%
chocolates.description: A dark chocolate from Ghana featuring notes of earthy, woody, cocoa.
chocolates.detailed_review: This Ghana chocolate opens with earthy aromas leading to woody flavors on the palate. The 72% cocoa content provides excellent balance with a smooth, lingering finish.

chocolates.name: White Chocolate 30%
chocolates.description: Premium white chocolate from Ghana with distinctive traditional, woody, classic profile.
chocolates.detailed_review: This bar showcases why Ghana is prized by chocolate connoisseurs. Beautiful traditional aromatics with woody flavors. Excellent craftsmanship from Charbonnel et Walker.

chocolates.name: Ivory 35%
chocolates.description: Single-origin white chocolate highlighting Mexico's cinnamon, traditional, vanilla character.
chocolates.detailed_review: Premium white chocolate with distinctive Mexico character. Rich cinnamon notes complemented by traditional complexity. Outstanding quality and remarkable finish.

chocolates.name: Creamy Milk 40%
chocolates.description: Premium milk chocolate from Guatemala with distinctive pepper, spicy, intense profile.
chocolates.detailed_review: Premium milk chocolate with distinctive Guatemala character. Rich pepper notes complemented by spicy complexity. Outstanding quality and remarkable finish.

chocolates.name: White Chocolate 35%
chocolates.description: Exceptional white chocolate showcasing Costa Rica's unique terroir with bright, lime, fruity characteristics.
chocolates.detailed_review: Exceptional chocolate expressing Costa Rica's terroir beautifully. Notes of bright and lime develop complexity as it melts. Well-crafted with excellent texture and clean finish.

chocolates.name: Blanc 35%
chocolates.description: Exceptional white chocolate showcasing Tanzania's unique terroir with bright, citrus, tropical fruit characteristics.
chocolates.detailed_review: A standout example of Tanzania cacao. The bright character is immediately apparent, followed by citrus undertones. Perfect cocoa percentage at 35% for optimal flavor expression.

chocolates.name: Blanc 32%
chocolates.description: A white chocolate from India featuring notes of cardamom, herbal, spicy.
chocolates.detailed_review: A standout example of India cacao. The cardamom character is immediately apparent, followed by herbal undertones. Perfect cocoa percentage at 32% for optimal flavor expression.

chocolates.name: Creamy Milk 40%
chocolates.description: Premium milk chocolate from Bolivia with distinctive exotic, complex, spicy profile.
chocolates.detailed_review: Exceptional chocolate expressing Bolivia's terroir beautifully. Notes of exotic and complex develop complexity as it melts. Well-crafted with excellent texture and clean finish.
